name: gnometouch
description: Enhances various aspects of the GNOME experience when using a touch device.
author: mityax

scripts.install: npm run build && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/gnometouch@mityax.github.com.zip && gnome-extensions enable gnometouch@mityax.github.com
scripts.install:release: npm run build:release && gnome-extensions install -f ./dist/gnometouch@mityax.github.com.zip && gnome-extensions enable gnometouch@mityax.github.com
scripts.watch: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch   2> >(grep -i -P --color 'gnometouch|Gjs-CRITICAL' 1>&2); pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
scripts.watch-verbose: npm run build -- --watch & pid="$!"; sleep 1s; dbus-run-session -- $(pwd)/run.sh --watch; pkill --signal SIGINT -P $pid
